claim: SR 78 from I-5 to I-15, and from the eastern junction with SR 86 to the eastern junction with SR 111 is part of the National Highway System (NHS), a network of highways that are considered essential to the country's economy, defense, and mobility by the Federal Highway Administration.

claim: Jeremy Signor of USgamer agreed that Knight Lore felt more like a world than a painting and added that the game's innovative use of successive, single-screen rooms pre-dated The Legend of Zelda by years.
title: Knight Lore
previous_sentence: Though isometric games had existed previously, in a retrospective review, Gillen (Rock, Paper, Shotgun) recalled that Knight Lore was the first game to offer a "world" with physical depth for exploration as opposed to the simple mechanics of arcade games.

subsequent_sentence_translated: Gillen o'yinning qattiq uslubi (kechirimaydigani o'yin, yuqori qiyinchilik, noqulay boshqaruv) relizidan keyingi 30 yil ichida eskirganligini aytdi va Knight Lore'ni "juda innovatsion, g'ayrioddiy atmosferali va mutlaqo o'ynab bo'lmaydigan" deb tanqid qildi va shunga o'xshash Head over Heels (1987) ancha yaxshi qariganligini aytdi.

claim_translated: Blay oʻz kundaliklarida isyonchilar sekstant va har qanday vaqt oʻlchagichdan bosh tortganliklarini eslatib oʻtadi, ammo kema oʻrinbosari Jeyms Morisonning aytishicha, Kristian oʻz shaxsiy sekstantini topshirib, "Mana, kapitan Blay, bu har qanday maqsad uchun kifoya qiladi va siz bu sekstantning yaxshi ekanligini bilasiz", degan.

claim: The historian Mark A. Lause rejects the numbers reported by the Confederates and suggests the Union figure is too low due to not accurately counting militia strength, suggesting a more accurate figure would be about 650.

previous_sentence: Some Confederate sources claimed as many as 1,000 Union soldiers were captured at Glasgow, and Union reports provide a figure of 550.

claim_translated: Tarixchi Mark A. Lause Konfederatsiyachilar e'lon qilgan raqamlarni rad etadi va Ittifoqning ko'rsatkichi militsiya kuchini to'g'ri hisoblamagani uchun juda past ekanligini ta'kidlaydi va yanada aniqroq raqam taxminan 650 bo'lishi kerakligini taklif qiladi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Itifoq qo'shinlarining yaradorlari haqidagi hisobotlarda yaradorlar soni maksimal 32 ta, o'lganlar soni esa 8 tadan 11 tagacha deb ko'rsatilgan, garchi Lause yaradorlar soni ehtimolga zid ravishda past ekanligini, bu ko'rsatkichda militsiya yo'qotishlari hisobga olinmaganligini va taxminan to'rt o'n nafar yarador bo'lgani haqiqiyroq ekanligini ta'kidlaydi.

claim: A 2001 article on Fauré in Baker's Biographical Dictionary of Musicians concludes thus:

claim_translated: 2001-yildagi Bakerning Musiqachilarning biografik lug'atida Fauré haqidagi maqola quyidagicha yakunlanadi:

claim: In January 1155 Theobald helped to secure the Chancellorship for his protégé, Thomas Becket, an action that Barlow speculates happened because Theobald hoped to secure more influence with the king through Becket.
title: Theobald of Bec
previous_sentence: For most of the remainder of Theobald's life he was occupied with ecclesiastical affairs in his diocese, as well as attending the royal court when Henry was in England.
subsequent_sentence: If this was his hope, Barlow notes that it did not materialise.
previous_sentence_translated: Teobald umrining qolgan qismida asosan o'z yeparxiyasidagi cherkov ishlariga, shuningdek, Genri Angliyada bo'lganda qirollik saroyida bo'lishga bag'ishladi.
claim_translated: 1155-yil yanvar oyida Teobald oʻz himoyachisi Tomas Beketga kansler lavozimini egallashida yordam berdi. Barlowning taxminicha, Teobald Beket orqali qirol bilan koʻproq aloqa oʻrnatishni umid qilganligi uchun shunday qilgan.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Agar bu uning umidi boʻlsa, Barlow taʼkidlaganidek, u amalga oshmadi.

claim: This was roughly the number of people living there on May 30, 1948, when a flood broke through Vanport's western levee.
title: Columbia Slough
previous_sentence: After the war, the population fell to about 18,500.
subsequent_sentence: The break occurred during the afternoon of a day with mild weather.
section_translated: Ikkinchi jahon urushi va undan keyingi davr
previous_sentence_translated: Urushdan keyin aholi soni taxminan 18 500 kishiga kamaydi.
claim_translated: 1948-yil 30-mayda Vanportning g'arbiy to'g'oni buzilib, suv toshqini yuz bergan paytda u yerda taxminan shu sondagi odamlar yashagan.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Uzilish yumshoq ob-havo boʻlgan kunning kun yarimida sodir boʻldi.

claim: In 2016 an appeal by Jetmir Buçpapa to serve the rest of his sentence in Albania was rejected by the Secretary of State for Justice.
title: Securitas depot robbery
subsequent_sentence: The following year on judicial review the decision was found to be irrational.
claim_translated: 2016-yili Jetmir Buçpapa qolgan umrboqiy qamoq jazosini Albaniyada oʻtash haqidagi iltimosi Adliya vaziri tomonidan rad etildi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Keyingi yili sud nazorati natijasida qaror mantiqqa zid deb topildi.

claim: Despite the praise it has received, the pavilion has its blemishes: the supporting north side of the structure along Randolph Street has attracted criticism for not being pleasing to the eye, and some observers found the exposed supporting proscenium braces offensive.
title: Jay Pritzker Pavilion
subsequent_sentence: Critic Fred Bernstein of The New York Times felt that the smooth rounded trellis and sharp-edged bandshell were geometrically discordant.
claim_translated: Olingan olqishlarga qaramay, pavilyonning o'z kamchiliklari bor: Randolph ko'chasi bo'ylab joylashgan inshootning shimoliy tomoni ko'rgazmali bo'lmagani uchun tanqidlarga uchragan va ba'zi kuzatuvchilar ochib qo'yilgan tayanch proseniy qavslarini noxush deb topishgan.
subsequent_sentence_translated: The New York Times gazetasining tanqidchisi Fred Bernstein silliq yumaloq panjara va o'tkir qirrali musiqa sahnasi geometrik jihatdan bir-biriga mos kelmasligini ta'kidlagan.

claim: Aboard the Sulaco, the queen, stowed away in the dropship's landing gear, attacks the group.
title: Aliens (film)
subsequent_sentence: The queen rips Bishop in half and advances on Newt, but Ripley battles the creature using an exosuit cargo loader, expelling it into space through an airlock while the damaged Bishop shields Newt.
claim_translated: Sulako kemasida, tushirish kemasining qo'nish mexanizmlariga yashiringan malika guruhga hujum qiladi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Malika Bishopni ikkiga yirtib, Newtga hujum qiladi, lekin Ripley ekzoskeletli yuk ko'taruvchi yordamida mavjudot bilan jang qilib, uni havo qulog'i orqali kosmosga chiqarib yuboradi, shu bilan birga shikastlangan Bishop Newtni himoya qiladi.

claim: The campaign was set up to remember Anning in her hometown of Lyme Regis by erecting a statue and creating a learning legacy in her name.
title: Mary Anning
previous_sentence: In August 2018, a campaign called "Mary Anning Rocks" was formed by an 11-year-old schoolgirl from Dorset, Evie Swire, supported by her mother Anya Pearson.
subsequent_sentence: A crowdfunding campaign began but was put on hold due to the COVID-19 pandemic in the United Kingdom; it resumed in November 2020.
previous_sentence_translated: 2018-yil avgust oyida Dorsetlik 11 yoshli maktab oʻquvchisi Evie Swire oʻz onasi Anya Pearsonning yordami bilan "Mary Anning Rocks" nomli kampaniyani tashkil qildi.
claim_translated: Kampaniya Anningni uning tug'ilgan shahri Laym-Redjise shahrida haykal o'rnatish va uning nomiga o'quv merosini yaratish orqali xotirlash uchun tashkil etildi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Katta miqdordagi mablag' yig'ish kampaniyasi boshlandi, ammo Buyuk Britaniyada COVID-19 pandemiyasi tufayli to'xtatildi; u 2020-yil noyabr oyida qayta boshlandi.

claim: Against this background, a "great assembly" was organised by the Manchester Patriotic Union formed by radicals from the Manchester Observer.
title: Peterloo Massacre
subsequent_sentence: Johnson, the union's secretary, wrote to Henry Hunt asking him to chair a meeting in Manchester on 2 August 1819.
claim_translated: Shu fonida "Manchester Observer" gazetasining radikal nashriyotchilari tomonidan tuzilgan Manchester Vatanparvarlar Ittifoqi "katta yig'in"ni tashkil qildi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Kasaba uyushmasi kotibi Jonson Genri Xantga 1819-yil 2-avgustda Mançesterda boʻlib oʻtadigan yigʻilishga raislik qilishini soʻrab maktub yozdi.

claim: Aside from the stated goals in each mission, there are secret objectives that if accomplished bestow bonuses to Eldred's attributes (magical and physical resistance, more mana, etc.).
title: Sacrifice (video game)
previous_sentence: As the game progresses, the player's choices align Eldred with one god.
previous_sentence_translated: O'yin davom etar ekan, o'yinchining tanlovlari Eldredni bitta xudo bilan birlashtiradi.
claim_translated: Har bir missiyadagi belgilangan maqsadlardan tashqari, agar bajarilsa, Eldredning xususiyatlariga (sehrli va jismoniy qarshilik, ko'proq manna va hokazo) bonuslar beradigan maxfiy maqsadlar ham mavjud.

claim: Hemingway has said he believes this avoidance made the heart and thrust of the story all the more acute, writing "'Big Two-Hearted River' is about a boy beat to the wide coming home from the war.... beat to the wide was an earlier and possibly more severe form of beat, since those who had been were unable to comment on this condition and could not suffer that it be mentioned in their presence.
title: Big Two-Hearted River
previous_sentence: While Hemingway painstakingly describes seemingly extraneous minutiae from Nick's fishing trip, he avoids or barely hints at the driving force of the work: the emotional turmoil wrought on Nick by his return home from a catastrophic war.
subsequent_sentence: So the war, all mention of the war, anything about the war is omitted."
previous_sentence_translated: Heminguey Nikning baliq ovlash sayohatidan olingan, ko'rinishidan keraksiz bo'lgan mayda-chuyda tafsilotlarni diqqat bilan tasvirlayotgan bo'lsa-da, asarning asosiy g'oyasini, ya'ni fojiali urushdan uyga qaytgan Nikning ichki kechinmalarini e'tibordan chetda qoldiradi yoki ularga deyarli ishora qilmaydi.
claim_translated: Heminguey bu o'tkazib yuborish hikoyaning mohiyatini yanada keskinlashtirganiga ishonishini aytgan va shunday yozgan: "'Katta Ikki Yurakli Daryo' urushdan qaytgan yigiti haqida... 'beat to the wide' urush qatnashchilarining oldingi va ehtimol yanada og'irroq holati edi, chunki urushda bo'lganlar bu holat haqida izoh bera olmagan va ularning huzurida bu haqda gapirishga chiday olmagan."
subsequent_sentence_translated: Shunday qilib, urush, urush haqidagi barcha eslatmalar, urush haqidagi hamma narsa o'chirib tashlangan.

claim: The disease caused the aliens to mutate into vampires vulnerable to ultraviolet light; they had been hibernating underground for millennia, occasionally venturing to the surface to feed on their victims' adrenaline.
title: The Dark Pictures Anthology: House of Ashes
previous_sentence: In the game's timeline, it was the site of the crash-landing of a spaceship that carried thousands of large, bat-like aliens, which were controlled by a parasite that gestates within the host's body.
subsequent_sentence: The prologue takes place in 2231 BC, as a Gutian army prepares to invade the capital Akkad and a solar eclipse allows the vampires beneath the temple to emerge and massacre both armies.
previous_sentence_translated: O'yinning vaqt jadvalida bu minglab yirik, qo'lqopga o'xshash chet elliklarni olib borgan kosmik kemaning qulagan joyi edi, ular xo'jayinning tanasida rivojlanadigan parazit tomonidan boshqarilardi.
claim_translated: Kasallik tufayli chet elliklar ultrabinafsha nurga zaif bo'lgan vampirlarga aylanishdi; ular ming yillar davomida er ostida qishki uyquda yotishgan, vaqti-vaqti bilan qurbonlarining adrenalinini iste'mol qilish uchun yer yuzasiga chiqqanlar.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Prologue miloddan avvalgi 2231-yildagi voqealarni tasvirlaydi, Gutian qo'shini poytaxt Akkadga bostirib kirishga tayyorgarlik ko'radi va quyosh tutilishi ibodatxona ostidagi vampirlarga chiqib, ikkala qo'shinni ham qirishga imkon beradi.

claim: Palaces are usually arranged around one or more courtyards, with their façades facing inwards; some examples are adorned with sculpture.
title: Maya civilization
subsequent_sentence: Some palaces possess associated hieroglyphic descriptions that identify them as the royal residences of named rulers.
claim_translated: Saroylar odatda bir yoki bir nechta hovlilar atrofida qurilgan bo'lib, ularning jabhalari ichkariga qaratilgan; ba'zi misollar haykallar bilan bezatilgan.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Ba'zi saroylar nomlari tilga olingan hukmdorlarning qirollik qarorgohlari ekanligini ko'rsatuvchi hieroglif tasvirlarga ega.

claim: Didunculus strigirostris (Tooth-billed pigeon)
title: Spotted green pigeon
claim_translated: Didunculus strigirostris (tish tumshuqli kabutar)

claim: Parish himself stated that he "took a risk early on that paid off as the race went on".
title: The Boat Race 2022
previous_sentence: Jasper did a phenomenal job coxing there."
subsequent_sentence: His counterpart Gellett noted that "I'd say it was a very aggressive approach to steering the line, and the course.
previous_sentence_translated: Jesper koks sifatida ajoyib ish qildi.
claim_translated: Parishning o'zi "boshida xavf ostiga kirganini, ammo poyga davom etgan sari bu xavf o'z samarasini berganini" ta'kidladi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Uning hamkasfi Gellett shunday dedi: "Men buni yo'nalish va kursni boshqarishga juda tajovuzkor yondashuv deb ayta olaman."

claim: I note the obvious differencesbetween each sort and type,but we are more alike, my friends,than we are unalike.
title: Themes in Maya Angelou's autobiographies
claim_translated: Men har bir tur va nav o'rtasidagi aniq farqlarni qayd etaman, lekin do'stlarim, biz bir-birimizga o'xshashroq emiz, o'xshash emasligimizdan ko'ra.

claim: It is possible that while Luther later saw the 31 October letter to Albert as the beginning of the Reformation, he did not post the Theses to the church door until mid-November, but he may not have posted them on the door at all.
title: Ninety-five Theses
previous_sentence: Melanchthon also claimed that Luther posted the Theses on 31 October, but this conflicts with several of Luther's statements about the course of events, and Luther always claimed that he brought his objections through proper channels rather than inciting a public controversy.
subsequent_sentence: Regardless, the Theses were well known among the Wittenberg intellectual elite soon after Luther sent them to Albert.
previous_sentence_translated: Melanxton, shuningdek, Luterni 31-oktabrda "Tezis"ni e'lon qilgan deb da'vo qilgan, ammo bu Luterni voqealar rivoji haqidagi bir nechta bayonotlariga zid keladi va Luterni har doim ommaviy munozarani qo'zg'atishdan ko'ra, o'z e'tirozlarini tegishli kanallar orqali olib borganini da'vo qilgan.
claim_translated: Luther keyinchalik 31 oktyabrdagi Albertga yozilgan maktubni islohotning boshlanishi deb hisoblagan bo'lsa-da, u tezislarini noyabr o'rtalariga qadar cherkov eshigiga osmagan bo'lishi mumkin, yoki umuman eshikka osmagan bo'lishi ham mumkin.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Shunga qaramay, Lutyer ularni Albertga yuborganidan ko'p o'tmay, "Tezislar" Vittenbergdagi ziyolilar o'rtasida keng tarqaldi.

claim: In the treatment facility, Aaron hears Julie's song when her video airs on television.
title: Latter Days
previous_sentence: Julie tells Christian that she hoped something good would come from it.
subsequent_sentence: The video prompts Aaron to return to Los Angeles in search of Christian.
previous_sentence_translated: Juliya Kristianshga undan biror yaxshilik chiqishiga umid qilganini aytadi.
claim_translated: Davolash muassasasida Aaron Julie'ning qo'shig'ini eshitadi, uning videosi televizorda efirga uzatilganda.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Video Aaronni Christianni qidirish uchun Los-Anjelesga qaytishga undaydi.

claim: Accolade's case was further hurt by a presentation by a Sega engineer named Takeshi Nagashima, who showed two Sega game cartridges that were able to run on the Genesis III without the trademark-displaying TMSS, and offered them to Accolade's defense team but would not reveal how that was possible.
title: Sega v. Accolade
previous_sentence: However, Judge Caulfield did not accept this explanation since Accolade was a game manufacturer, their works were for financial gain, and because their works competed directly with Sega's licensed games, likely resulting in a sales decrease for Sega's games.
subsequent_sentence: Ultimately, this would result in Accolade's defeat on April 3, 1992, when Judge Caulfield ruled in favor of Sega and issued an injunction prohibiting future sales by Accolade of Genesis-compatible games incorporating the Sega message or using the results of the reverse engineering.
previous_sentence_translated: Biroq, hakam Caulfield bu tushuntirishni qabul qilmadi, chunki Accolade o'yin ishlab chiqaruvchisi edi, ularning ishlari moliyaviy foyda uchun edi va ularning ishlari Sega litsenziyalangan o'yinlari bilan to'g'ridan-to'g'ri raqobatlashganligi sababli, ehtimol Sega o'yinlari sotuvining kamayishiga olib kelgan.
claim_translated: Accolade'ning ishi Sega muhandisi Takeshi Nagashima taqdimoti bilan yanada yomonlashdi. U Genesis III'da TMSS'siz ishlaydigan ikkita Sega o'yin kartrijini ko'rsatdi va ularni Accolade'ning himoya jamoasiga taklif qildi, lekin bu qanday imkon bo'lganini oshkor qilmadi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Natijada, 1992-yil 3-aprelda Accolade mag'lub bo'ldi, chunki sudya Caulfield Sega foydasiga hukm chiqardi va Accolade'ga Sega xabarini o'z ichiga olgan yoki teskari muhandislik natijalaridan foydalangan holda Genesis mos o'yinlarni sotishni taqiqlovchi taqiq qo'ydi.

claim: On 9 April, David and Stephen's wife Matilda of Boulogne (daughter of Mary of Scotland, and so another niece of David) met each other at Durham and agreed a settlement.
title: David I of Scotland
section: Battle of the Standard and Second Treaty of Durham
previous_sentence: Alberic played the role of peace broker, and David agreed to a six-week truce, which excluded the siege of Wark.
subsequent_sentence: David's son Henry was given the earldom of Northumberland and was restored to the earldom of Huntingdon and lordship of Doncaster; David himself was allowed to keep Carlisle and Cumberland.
section_translated: Standart jangi va Durhamning ikkinchi shartnomasi
previous_sentence_translated: Alberik tinchlik vositachisi rolini o'ynadi va Devid olti haftalik sulhga rozi bo'ldi, bu sulhga Varkni qamal qilish kiritilmagan edi.
claim_translated: 9-aprel kuni Devid va Stivenga turmushga chiqqan Matilda Boulogne (Shotlandiyalik Mariyaning qizi va shuning uchun Devidning yana bir jiyani) Durxemda uchrashib, kelishuvga erishdilar.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Davidning oʻgʻli Genrixga Nortumberlend grafligi berildi va u Xantingdon grafligi hamda Donkaster lordligiga qaytarildi; Davidning oʻziga esa Karlayl va Kamberlendni saqlab qolishga ruxsat berildi.

claim: Dr. Ashford informs Alice of an extraction point with a waiting helicopter.
title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
previous_sentence: Alice uses some of the serum to cure Carlos.

subsequent_sentence_translated: Guruh uchrashuv joyiga yetib keladi, ammo "Umbrella" kuchlari tomonidan tuzoqqa olinadi.

claim: Sam secretly summons her and asks for her knife, and Ruby tells him that his dormant psychic abilities could easily kill Lilith, whose guard is down as she is on "shore leave".
title: No Rest for the Wicked (Supernatural)
previous_sentence: Dean does not want to attack unprepared, but he refuses to seek help from Ruby.
subsequent_sentence: Sam considers the alternative, but Dean shows up and tricks Ruby into a devil's trap—mystical symbols capable of rendering a demon powerless—and the brothers take her knife and leave.
previous_sentence_translated: Dean tayyorlanmay turib hujum qilishni istamaydi, lekin Rubidan yordam so'rashdan bosh tortadi.
claim_translated: Sem uni yashirincha chaqirib, pichog'ini so'raydi va Ruby unga uning uyqudagi psixik qobiliyatlari Lilithni osonlikcha o'ldirishi mumkinligini aytadi, chunki Lilith "brifingda" bo'lgani uchun qoriqchiligi tushirilgan.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Sem muqobil variantni ko'rib chiqadi, lekin Din paydo bo'lib, Rubini iblis tuzog'iga aldaydi - iblisni kuchsiz qila oladigan mistik belgilar - va aka-ukalar uning pichog'ini olib ketishadi.

claim: Lupin resumes his friendship with Murray Posh and Daisy, who is now Mrs Posh.

claim_translated: Lupin Murray Posh va Daisy bilan do'stligini qayta tiklaydi, Daisy endi xonim Posh.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Lupin Bayswaterdagi turar joyga ko'chib o'tadi va u yerga Pooter hamda Kerri kechki ovqatga taklif qilinadi. U yerda ular Murrayning "Lillie Girl" nomi bilan tanilgan, taxminan 30 yoshlardagi singlisi bilan uchrashishadi.

claim: In a second bibliography with Emmet Lewis focusing on women, transgender, and non-binary composers, they assert that while many works have been written by these groups, they are often not published through traditional means, and "gender inequality remains systemic and common practice in carillon concerts."
title: Carillon
previous_sentence: In a bibliography focusing on African-American music and composers, Ng claims, "while African-American music permeates the carillon repertoire," mostly in the form of spirituals, "almost none of the carillon arrangements and compositions are authored by African Americans."
previous_sentence_translated: Afrika-amerikalik musiqasi va bastakorlariga bag'ishlangan bibliografiyada Ng, "Afrika-amerikalik musiqasi karillon repertuariga kirib borsa ham", asosan, ma'naviy qo'shiqlar shaklida, "karillon aranjirovkalari va kompozitsiyalarining deyarli hech biri afrika-amerikaliklar tomonidan yozilmagan" deb da'vo qiladi.
claim_translated: Emmet Lyuis bilan birgalikda ayollar, transseksuallar va nobinar bastakorlarga qaratilgan ikkinchi bibliografiyada, bu guruhlar tomonidan ko'plab asarlar yozilgan bo'lsa-da, ular ko'pincha an'anaviy usullar bilan nashr etilmaydi va "gender tengsizligi karillon kontsertlarida tizimli va keng tarqalgan amaliyot bo'lib qolmoqda" deb ta'kidlanadi.

claim: The New York Times wrote that they expected the Trinity Place plant would be sold once the new Bronx facility was in operation.
title: American Bank Note Company Printing Plant
previous_sentence: The sale closed on November 20, 1908.
subsequent_sentence: The total cost for the project was to be greater than $2 million ($70 million in 2024), with American Bank Note having a current capitalization of $10 million ($350 million in 2024).
previous_sentence_translated: Savdo 1908-yil 20-noyabrda yakunlandi.
claim_translated: The New York Times gazetasi Trinity Place zavodi yangi Bronx zavodi ishga tushgach sotilishini kutayotganliklarini yozgan.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Loyiha uchun umumiy xarajat 2 million dollardan (2024-yildagi 70 million dollar) oshishi kerak edi, American Bank Note kompaniyasining joriy kapitalizatsiyasi esa 10 million dollarni (2024-yildagi 350 million dollar) tashkil etadi.

claim: Quint, estimating it is 25 feet (7.6 m) long and weighs 3 tonnes (3.0 long tons; 3.3 short tons), harpoons it with a line attached to a flotation barrel, but the shark pulls it underwater and disappears.
title: Jaws (film)
previous_sentence: As Brody lays down a chum line, the shark suddenly appears behind the boat.
previous_sentence_translated: Brodi yem solayotganda, kutilmaganda qayiqning orqasida akula paydo bo'ladi.
claim_translated: Kvinnt, uning uzunligi 25 fut (7,6 m) va ogʻirligi 3 tonna (3,0 uzun tonna; 3,3 qisqa tonna) ekanligini taxmin qilib, uni suzuvchi bochka bilan bogʻlangan arqon bilan tutadi, lekin akula uni suv ostiga tortib olib gʻoyib boʻladi.

claim: A wide variety of volcanic rocks comprise the Ice Peak Formation, including alkali basalt, hawaiite, trachybasalt, tristanite, mugearite, benmoreite and trachyte.
title: Volcanism of the Mount Edziza volcanic complex
previous_sentence: The first eruptive period created the Ice Peak Formation which overlies the Armadillo, Nido and Pyramid formations.
subsequent_sentence: The second eruptive period resulted in the creation of the Pillow Ridge Formation which consists mainly of alkali basalt.
previous_sentence_translated: Birinchi otiluvchanlik davrida muzli cho'qqi hosilasi paydo bo'lib, u Armadillo, Nido va Piramida hosilalarining ustida joylashgan.
claim_translated: Muz cho'qqisi geologik formatsiyasi keng turdagi vulqon jinslaridan iborat bo'lib, ular orasida ishqoriy bazalt, havayit, traxibazalt, tristanit, mugearit, benmoreit va traxit mavjud.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Ikkinchi otiluvchanlik davri natijasida asosan ishqoriy bazaltdan iborat boʻlgan Yostiqsimon qir choʻqqisi hosil boʻldi.

claim: Meanwhile, Salim returns home and searches for his son, but his commanding officer, Dar Basri, forces Salim to intercept Eric's raid, headed by Jason.
title: The Dark Pictures Anthology: House of Ashes
previous_sentence: He tells them that there may be a facility underneath the village hiding chemical weapons.
subsequent_sentence: Salim's squad ambushes the Americans on arrival, but sinkholes plunge everyone into the Akkadian temple buried beneath the sand.
previous_sentence_translated: U ularga qishloq ostida kimyoviy qurollarni yashirish uchun inshoot bo'lishi mumkinligini aytadi.
claim_translated: Shu bilan birga, Salim uyga qaytib, o'g'lini qidiradi, ammo uning qo'mondoni Dar Basri Salimni Jason boshchiligidagi Erikning reydini to'xtatishga majbur qiladi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Salimning jamoasi amerikaliklarga kelganda pistirma qo'yadi, ammo yer yorilishi tufayli hamma qum ostida yotgan akkad ibodatxonasiga tushib ketadi.

claim: A second song, "Horses in Heaven", followed in January 2025.
title: Randy Travis
section: 2019–present: Return to touring, Precious Memories, artificial intelligence, and tribute
previous_sentence: "Where That Came From" made the Billboard country charts a month after its release, peaking at number 45.
subsequent_sentence: This song's vocal track was created through the same voice cloning technology as "Where That Came From", but with a newly recorded vocal bed featuring four singers.

previous_sentence_translated: "Where That Came From" qo'shig'i chiqqanidan bir oy o'tmay Billboard kantri chartlariga kirdi va 45-o'rinni egalladi.
claim_translated: Ikkinchi qo'shiq, "Horses in Heaven", 2025-yil yanvar oyida chiqqan.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Ushbu qo'shiqning vokal treki "Where That Came From" qo'shig'i bilan bir xil ovoz klonlash texnologiyasi orqali yaratilgan, ammo to'rt nafar qo'shiqchining yangi yozilgan vokali bilan.

claim: One officer's eye was cut and a few others were bruised from being struck by flying debris.
title: Stonewall riots

claim: His enthronement at Rochester Cathedral had to be postponed until October, when he was able to resume his work.
title: Randall Davidson
previous_sentence: Eleven days later Davidson fell dangerously ill from a perforated ulcer, and was confined to his house in Kennington for six months.
subsequent_sentence: During a miners' strike in 1893 he was prominent in pleading for a decent standard of living as an essential condition for the settlement of labour disputes.
previous_sentence_translated: O'n bir kun o'tgach, Devidson perforatsiyalangan yaradan xavfli darajada kasal bo'lib qoldi va olti oy davomida Kennington shahridagi uyida yotishga majbur bo'ldi.
claim_translated: Uning Rochester soborida taxtga o'tirishi oktyabrgacha qoldirildi, o'shanda u o'z ishini davom ettira oldi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: 1893-yildagi konchilarning ish tashlashlari paytida u mehnat nizolarini hal qilishning muhim sharti sifatida munosib turmush darajasini talab qilib, o'zini ko'rsatdi.

claim: Damage and deaths include totals while the storm was extratropical, a wave, or a low, and all of the damage figures are in 2007 USD.
title: 2007 Atlantic hurricane season
previous_sentence: Deaths in parentheses are additional and indirect (an example of an indirect death would be a traffic accident), but were still related to that storm.
previous_sentence_translated: Qavs ichidagi o'limlar qo'shimcha va bilvosita (bilvosita o'limga misol sifatida yo'l-transport hodisasini keltirish mumkin), ammo ular hali ham o'sha bo'ron bilan bog'liq edi.
claim_translated: Zarar va o'limlar soni bo'ron ekstratrogik, to'lqin yoki past bosim bo'lgan paytdagi umumiy sonni bildiradi va barcha zarar ko'rsatkichlari 2007-yilgi AQSh dollarida keltirilgan.

claim: Lukather describes the album as being a "real" and "honest" reflection of the period between 2008 and 2010, when he experienced difficulties within his private life.
title: Steve Lukather
section: 2008–2013: Ever Changing Times, All's Well That Ends Well, and Transition
previous_sentence: While Lukather focused on instrumental writing and production on previous albums but collaborated with lyricists, he wrote much of the lyrics for All's Well That Ends Well himself.
section_translated: 2008–2013: "Doimiy o'zgaruvchan zamonlar", "Hammasi yaxshi, agar oxiri yaxshi bo'lsa" va "O'tish"
previous_sentence_translated: Lukater avvalgi albomlarda asbobi musiqa yozish va prodyuserlikka e'tibor qaratgan bo'lsa-da, u matn mualliflari bilan hamkorlik qilgan, ammo "All's Well That Ends Well" albomining ko'p qismini o'zi yozgan.
claim_translated: Lukater albumni 2008-2010-yillar orasidagi davrning "haqiqiy" va "chin" aks-sadosi deb ta'riflaydi, chunki u shaxsiy hayotida qiyinchiliklarni boshdan kechirgan.

claim: Dewall refuses to do business with Rust but unwittingly leads him and Marty to their meth lab hidden in the bayou.
title: True Detective season 1
previous_sentence: In 1995, Ginger brings Rust to Dewall Ledoux, Reggie's cousin and meth-cooking partner.
subsequent_sentence: Marty apprehends Reggie Ledoux, who makes cryptic statements about "Carcosa".
previous_sentence_translated: 1995-yili Ginger Rustni Reggie'ning amakivachchisi va metamfetamin pishiruvchi hamkori Dewall Ledoux'ga olib boradi.
claim_translated: Devoll Rust bilan biznes qilishdan bosh tortadi, lekin beixtiyor Rust va Marty'ni botqoda yashiringan met laboratoriyasiga olib boradi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Marti "Karcosa" haqida sirli bayonotlar bergan Reggie Ledouxni qo'lga oladi.

claim: By 2014 its generating capacity was downrated by 23% to 1592 MW and was providing power only during periods of peak demand.
title: Hoover Dam
previous_sentence: The amount of electricity generated by Hoover Dam has been decreasing along with the falling water level in Lake Mead due to the prolonged drought since year 2000 and high demand for the Colorado River's water.
subsequent_sentence: Lake Mead fell to a new record low elevation of 1,071.61 feet (326.63 m) on July 1, 2016, before beginning to rebound slowly.
section_translated: Elektr stansiyasi va suvga bo'lgan talablar
previous_sentence_translated: 2000-yildan beri davom etayotgan qurg'oqchilik va Kolorado daryosi suvi uchun yuqori talab tufayli Miid ko'lidagi suv sathining pasayishi bilan birga Hoover to'g'onida ishlab chiqarilayotgan elektr energiyasi miqdori ham kamayib bormoqda.
claim_translated: 2014-yilga kelib, uning energiya ishlab chiqarish quvvati 23% ga kamayib, 1592 MVt ga tushdi va elektr energiyasi faqat eng yuqori talab davrida ta'minlandi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: 2016-yil 1-iyulda Mead koʻli 1071,61 fut (326,63 m) darajagacha pasayib, yangi rekord darajaga erishdi va keyin sekin-asta koʻtarila boshladi.

claim: The Société presented concerts of recent works by American composers including Aaron Copland, Virgil Thomson and George Antheil and by Vaughan Williams and his English colleagues Arnold Bax and Cyril Scott.
title: Maurice Ravel
previous_sentence: Through the Société Musicale Indépendante, he was able to encourage them and composers from other countries.
previous_sentence_translated: Société Musicale Indépendante orqali u ularni va boshqa mamlakatlardan kelgan bastakorlarni rag'batlantira oldi.
claim_translated: Jamiyat Aaron Kopland, Virjil Tomson va Jorj Antil kabi amerikalik bastakorlar hamda Von Vilyams va uning ingliz hamkasblari Arnold Baks va Kiril Skottning yaqinda yaratilgan asarlaridan iborat kontsertlarni taqdim etdi.

claim: James Hurley and Donna discuss their new relationship, and kiss passionately on Donna's sofa.
title: Episode 2 (Twin Peaks)
subsequent_sentence: Elsewhere, Leland Palmer (Ray Wise), still mourning Laura's death, dances in his living room, sobbing and holding a portrait of Laura as he does so.
claim_translated: Jeyms Herli va Donna yangi munosabatlari haqida suhbatlashishadi va Donnaning divanida ishtiyoq bilan o'pishishadi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Boshqa bir joyda, Laura o'limidan hali ham motam tutayotgan Leland Palmer (Rey Vayz) yashash xonasida yig'lab, qo'lida Lauraning portretini ushlab turgan holda raqsga tushadi.

claim: Falstaff hides first behind the screen, but realizes that Ford will likely look for him there.
title: Falstaff (opera)
previous_sentence: Mistress Quickly rushes in, shouting that Ford has returned home unexpectedly with a retinue of henchmen to catch his wife's lover.
subsequent_sentence: The women urge him to hide in the laundry basket, which he does.
previous_sentence_translated: Xizmatkor ayol Quickly yugurib kirib, Fordning xotinining sevgilisini ushlab olmoq uchun kutilmaganda bir guruh yordamchilari bilan uyga qaytganini baqirib aytadi.
claim_translated: Falstaff avvaliga parda ortiga yashirinadi, lekin Ford ehtimol uni u yerda qidirishini tushunadi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Ayollar uni kir yuvish savatiga yashirinishga undaydi va u shunday qiladi.

claim: After hearing Leone's plight, Don Gaspar convinces him to travel to Naples to have his exile lifted.
title: L'Ange de Nisida
previous_sentence: While on Nisida, Leone encounters Don Gaspar, Chamberlain to King Fernand of Naples.
subsequent_sentence: Leone and Sylvia meet in Naples, at which time Leone discovers that she is actually Sylvia de Linares, the King's mistress.
previous_sentence_translated: Nisida orolida Leone Neapol qiroli Fernandning saroy aʼyonlaridan biri boʻlgan Don Gasparga duch keladi.
claim_translated: Leone'ning ahvolini eshitgach, Don Gaspar uni surgunlikdan ozod bo'lish uchun Neapolga borishga ko'ndiradi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Leone va Sylvia Neapolda uchrashadi va o'sha paytda Leone uning aslida qirolning sevgilisi Sylvia de Linares ekanligini bilib qoladi.

claim: As the family grieved over Sam's sudden passing, the success of The Jazz Singer helped establish Warner Bros. as a major studio.
title: Jack L. Warner
subsequent_sentence: From an investment of only $500,000 in the film, the studio reaped $3 million in profits.
claim_translated: Oila Semning to'satdan vafot etishi tufayli motam tutayotgan bir paytda, "The Jazz Singer" filmining muvaffaqiyati Warner Bros.ni yirik studiya sifatida o'rnatishga yordam berdi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Kino uchun atigi 500 000 dollar sarmoya kiritgan studiya 3 million dollar foyda ko'rdi.

claim: A 2019 study suggested that it would have reached 7 m (23 ft) in maximum length.
title: Goblin shark
previous_sentence: However, the capture of an enormous female estimated at 5.4–6.2 m (18–20 ft) long during 2000 showed this species can grow far larger than suspected previously.
subsequent_sentence: Until 2022, the maximum weight recorded was 210 kg (460 lb) for a shark of 3.8 m (12.5 ft) in length, but the following year, a heavily pregnant, 4.7-metre (15 ft) individual weighing 800 kg (1,800 lb), was landed in Taiwan.
previous_sentence_translated: Biroq, 2000-yillarda uzunligi 5,4–6,2 m (18–20 fut) deb baholangan ulkan urg'ochining qo'lga olinishi bu tur avvalgi taxminlardan ancha katta bo'lishi mumkinligini ko'rsatdi.
claim_translated: 2019-yildagi tadqiqotga ko'ra, uning maksimal uzunligi 7 metr (23 fut) ga yetgan bo'lishi mumkin.
subsequent_sentence_translated: 2022-yilgacha qayd etilgan eng katta ogʻirlik 210 kg (460 funt) boʻlib, bu 3,8 m (12,5 fut) uzunlikdagi akulaga toʻgʻri kelgan, ammo keyingi yili Tayvanda 4,7 m (15 fut) uzunlikdagi, 800 kg (1800 funt) ogʻirlikdagi, homilador akula ushlab olindi.

claim: With his demise rapidly approaching, Dean has begun "piercing the veil", allowing him to glimpse the demons' true forms.
title: No Rest for the Wicked (Supernatural)
previous_sentence: Despite Dean's objections, Bobby insists that he accompany them, and draws attention to Dean's hallucinations.
previous_sentence_translated: Deanning e'tirozlariga qaramay, Bobbi uning o'zi bilan birga borishini talab qiladi va Deanning gallyutsinatsiyalariga e'tibor qaratadi.
claim_translated: O'limi tezlik bilan yaqinlashayotganligi sababli, Din "pardani tesha boshlaydi", bu esa unga iblislarning haqiqiy qiyofalarini ko'rish imkonini beradi.

claim: Side quests, called "Secret Missions" in it, are located in hidden or out-of-the-way areas and are not required for completion, but provide permanent power-ups.
title: Devil May Cry (video game)
previous_sentence: The main storyline often requires the player to find key items to advance, in a manner similar to puzzles in the Resident Evil games, as well as optional platforming and exploration tasks to find hidden caches of "orbs".
subsequent_sentence: They typically challenge the player to defeat a group of enemies in a specific manner or within a time limit, or solve a puzzle.
previous_sentence_translated: Asosiy hikoya liniyasi ko'pincha o'yinchidan "Resident Evil" o'yinlaridagi jumboqlarga o'xshash tarzda, shuningdek, yashirin "orb" omborlarini topish uchun qo'shimcha platforma va eksploratsiya vazifalarini bajarishni talab qiladi.
claim_translated: Unda "Maxfiy missiyalar" deb nomlangan qo'shimcha vazifalar yashirin yoki chekka hududlarda joylashgan bo'lib, ularni bajarish majburiy emas, lekin doimiy kuchaytirgichlarni taqdim etadi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Ular odatda o'yinchiga dushmangan guruhni ma'lum bir tarzda yoki ma'lum bir vaqt ichida mag'lub etishni yoki jumboqni yechishni taklif qiladi.

claim: Weasel skins sewn to the back of the parka provided speed and cleverness.
title: Inuit clothing
previous_sentence: Hunters might wear a pair of tiny model boots while out hunting to ensure that their own boots would last.
subsequent_sentence: For women, ermine skins provided liveliness and energy, while loon skins helped with music and dancing.
previous_sentence_translated: Ovlachilar o'z etiklari uzoqroq xizmat qilishini ta'minlash uchun ovga chiqqanda kichik modulli etiklarni kiyishlari mumkin.
claim_translated: Parkaning orqa qismiga tikilgan norko'rki terisi tezlik va chaqqonlikni ta'minlagan.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Ayollar uchun ermin terisi jonlilik va energiya baxsh etgan, g'oz terisi esa musiqa va raqsga yordam bergan.

claim: They had a standard displacement of 83 tonnes (82 long tons) and 88–90 tonnes (87–89 long tons) at full load.
title: Schichau-class torpedo boat
previous_sentence: The boats had a waterline length of 39.88 metres (130 ft 10 in), a beam of 4.8 m (15 ft 9 in), and a maximum draught of 1.9 m (6 ft 3 in).
subsequent_sentence: The crew consisted of 16 to 18 officers and enlisted men.
previous_sentence_translated: Kemalarning suv chizig'i uzunligi 39,88 metr (130 fut 10 dyuym), eni 4,8 m (15 fut 9 dyuym) va maksimal tortishish kuchi 1,9 m (6 fut 3 dyuym) edi.
claim_translated: Ular standart siljishi 83 tonna (82 uzun tonna) va to'liq yuklanganda 88-90 tonna (87-89 uzun tonna) edi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Ekipaj 16-18 nafar ofitser va askarlardan iborat edi.

claim: She was pulled free two days later after enough coal and ammunition were thrown overboard to lighten the ship.
title: SMS Wörth
previous_sentence: On 16 February 1905, Wörth ran aground in the Kieler Förde.
subsequent_sentence: She then steamed into Kiel and entered drydock, where her bottom was found to be slightly dented.
previous_sentence_translated: 1905-yil 16-fevralda "Vörth" kemasi Kieler Förde qo'ltiqida qirg'oqqa urilib qolgan.
claim_translated: Ikki kundan keyin, kemani yengillashtirish uchun yetarlicha ko'mir va o'q-dori dengizga tashlangach, u qutqarildi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Keyin u Kielga qarab yo'l olib, quruq dokka kirdi va u yerda uning pastki qismi biroz eginganligi aniqlandi.

claim: Rust also returns to Light of the Way Academy, where he finds more twig sculptures and dark imagery on the walls.
title: True Detective season 1
previous_sentence: Rust returns to the Dora Lange murder site and discovers that the same tree is now adorned with twig sculptures and a large wreath of vines and roots, all of them surreptitiously placed recently just like the twig sculpture in Marie Fontenot's playhouse found years earlier.
previous_sentence_translated: Rust Dora Langening oʻldirilgan joyiga qaytib keladi va oʻsha daraxt endi novdali haykallar va toklar hamda ildizlardan yasalgan katta guldasta bilan bezatilganini, bularning barchasi yaqinda, xuddi yillar avval topilgan Mari Fontenoning oʻyin uyidagi novdali haykal kabi, yashirin tarzda qoʻyilganini kashf etadi.
claim_translated: Rust "Yo'l Yoritgichi" akademiyasiga qaytadi va u yerda devorlarda yana ko'p novdadan yasalgan haykallar va qorong'u tasvirlarni topadi.

claim: Her employer was questioned, as was her apothecary, who thought that Canning would have been quite able to survive on the pitcher of water and crusts of bread she claimed to have been given.
title: Elizabeth Canning
previous_sentence: Two of Canning's neighbours testified to her "deplorable condition".
subsequent_sentence: The defence responded with three witnesses, who each believed that they had encountered a "poor, miserable wretch" at the end of January, when she claimed to have escaped.
previous_sentence_translated: Kanningning ikki qo‘shnisi uning “achinarli ahvolini” tasdiqladi.
claim_translated: Uning ish beruvchisi, shuningdek, dorisi ham so'roq qilindi. Dorisi, Canningga berilgani aytilgan bir qadah suv va non qobig'i bilan u omon qolishi mumkin deb o'yladi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Himoya tomoni uch nafar guvohni chaqirdi. Ularning har biri yanvar oyining oxirida, ayol qochib ketganini da'vo qilgan paytda, "kambag'al, nochor ayol"ga duch kelganiga ishonishdi.

claim: Writing for the Philippine Daily Inquirer, Torre found the leads' portrayals to be "earnest" and "committed".
title: Angel Locsin

claim: In 2021, the city had approximately 22,000 households and 350 hotels and restaurants.

claim: Todd Edwards wrote nine original songs for the film and sung four of them: "Critters Have Feelings", "Tree Critter", "Eva Deanna", and "Glow"."Eva Deanna" was written about a day that he and his wife spent at the zoo with their niece, the daughter of associate producer Katie Hooten."Glow" was written about the Edwards siblings' grandmother, Vera, who had died a few years earlier."Great Big World" was sung by Anne Hathaway and replaced another song called "Woods Go-Round", which Edwards considered too childish and described as being "in the vein of Saturday morning cartoons."

"Great Big World" qoshigʻini Anne Hathaway kuylagan va Edwards bolalarga moʻljallangan multfilmlarga oʻxshashligi sababli "Woods Go-Round" qoshigʻini almashtirgan.

claim: Some street newspaper proponents believe that the primary aim of the papers should be to give homeless individuals a voice and to "fill the void" in mainstream media coverage, whereas others believe it should be to provide homeless individuals with jobs and an income.

"The Big Issue" kabi gazeta ko'cha bolalari muammolariga sarmoya kiritish uchun katta foyda keltirish maqsadida asosiy oqimdagi gazeta va jurnallarga taqlid qiladi, boshqalari esa pul keltiradigan kontentga emas, balki siyosiy va ijtimoiy muammolarga e'tibor qaratadi.
claim_translated: Ba'zi ko'cha gazetalari tarafdorlari ushbu gazetalarning asosiy maqsadi uyusiz shaxslarga ovoz berish va ommaviy axborot vositalarining asosiy qamrovidagi "bo'shliqni to'ldirish" bo'lishi kerak deb hisoblaydi, boshqalari esa uyusiz shaxslarga ish va daromad keltirish kerak deb hisoblaydi.

claim: However, several circumstances were in play that made the Stonewall riots memorable.
title: Stonewall riots
previous_sentence: Not only had the Mattachine Society been active in major cities such as Los Angeles and Chicago, but similarly marginalized people started the riot at Compton's Cafeteria in 1966 and another riot responded to a raid on Los Angeles' Black Cat Tavern in 1967.
subsequent_sentence: The location of the Lower Manhattan raid was a factor: it was across the street from The Village Voice offices, and the narrow crooked streets gave the rioters an advantage over the police.
previous_sentence_translated: Mattachine jamiyati nafaqat Los-Anjeles va Chikago kabi yirik shaharlarda faol boʻlgan, balki shunga oʻxshash kamsitilgan odamlar 1966-yili Compton's Cafeteria'da tartib-toʻzishni boshlagan va yana bir tartib-toʻzish 1967-yili Los-Anjelesdagi Black Cat Tavern'ga qilingan reydga javoban yuz bergan.
claim_translated: Biroq, Stonewall tartib-bozliklarini yodda qolarlik qilgan bir necha omillar mavjud edi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Pastki Manxettendagi tartibsizliklar joyi ham muhim omil bo'ldi: u The Village Voice ofislarining ro'parasida joylashgan edi va tor, qiyshiq ko'chalar tartibsizlikni keltirib chiqarganlarga politsiyaga nisbatan ustunlik berdi.

claim: Its publications were generally distributed privately or sent to bookshops to be given to customers free to avoid attracting the attention of the South African authorities.

Bu kichik yerto'la nashriyot 1970-yillarning oxirida aparteidga qarshi adabiyot va boshqa materiallarni chop etish uchun tashkil etilgan bo'lib, Janubiy Afrikadagi noshirlar senzura qo'rquvi tufayli bunday materiallarni nashr etishdan bosh tortishgan.

claim: The effect of water fluoridation on the natural environment has been investigated, and although some claim that no adverse effects have been established, other items find evidence of harm or of concern.
title: Water fluoridation
subsequent_sentence: Issues studied have included fluoride concentrations in groundwater and downstream rivers; lawns, gardens, and plants; consumption of plants grown in fluoridated water; air emissions; and equipment noise.
claim_translated: Suvni ftorlashning tabiiy muhitga ta'siri o'rganilgan va ba'zilar uning salbiy ta'siri aniqlanmaganligini ta'kidlasa-da, boshqa manbalar zarar yoki xavf mavjudligiga oid dalillarni topgan.
subsequent_sentence_translated: O'rganilgan masalalar orasida yer osti suvlari va quyi oqim daryolaridagi ftorid konsultatsiyalari; maysazorlar, bog'lar va o'simliklar; ftorlangan suvda o'stirilgan o'simliklarni iste'mol qilish; havo emissiyalari; va uskunaning shovqini mavjud.

claim: The nearby rapids in the Saint Lawrence required portage, making the Cedars a strategic landing point for anyone navigating the river to or from Montreal.
